mapper.select: SELECT o.cod, c.name as clientName, e.name as empName, o.client_cod, o.employee_cod as employeeCod, date_format(o.order_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as orderDate, d.name as deptName, date_format(o.dday, '%Y-%m-%d') as dday from orders o join client c on o.client_cod = c.cod JOIN employee e on o.employee_cod = e.cod join department d on e.department_cod = d.cod where o.cod = #{cod};
